jobs.title: Data Engineer
jobs.description:
Medior Data Engineer ‚Äì Utrecht (Hybrid)




Are you passionate about building scalable data solutions in the cloud? Do you want to work on a modern data platform from scratch while sharpening your skills with top-level training?

At Xccelerated, we‚Äôre looking for Data Engineers to help build a state-of-the-art Data Platform in Google Cloud Platform. You‚Äôll join forces with experienced consultants and get over 60 days of tailored training to maximize your growth and impact.




üí° Why Join Us?

‚úî Help design, build and maintain a modern Data Platform from scratch on Google Cloud Platform

‚úî Collaborate with engineering and analytics teams to build scalable pipelines and deploy models

‚úî Receive over 60 days of in-depth technical training and project support from our Tech Leads

‚úî After one year, transition to a direct contract with the client organization




üöÄ What You‚Äôll Be Doing

As a Data Engineer at Xccelerated, you‚Äôll be part of a team building the foundation for data-driven decision making.

üîπ Build and maintain scalable data pipelines and infrastructure on GCP

üîπ Develop components of the data platform that enable analytics and machine learning use cases

üîπ Ensure robust integration between systems and data models

üîπ Collaborate with engineering and analytics teams to align architecture and implementation




üë® üíª Who You Are

You‚Äôre a hands-on engineer with a strong can-do mentality. You enjoy solving challenges and learning by doing.

‚úÖ Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Cloud Computing, or related field

‚úÖ 1‚Äì4 years of experience as a Data Engineer

‚úÖ Skilled in Python and familiar with at least one public cloud (GCP, AWS, or Azure)

‚úÖ Experience with modern data tooling like Databricks, Spark, or Airflow

‚úÖ Proactive, eager to learn, and focused on impact




üéÅ What We Offer

At Xccelerated, we don‚Äôt just offer a job‚Äîwe offer a launchpad for your career in Data & Cloud.

üí∞ Competitive salary ‚Äì we value your skills and experience

jobs.title: Data Engineer
jobs.description:
Voor een klant van ons uit Utrecht zoeken wij een interim Data Engineer die wordt ingezet binnen het Data & Analytics team. De focus ligt op het ontwerpen, bouwen en onderhouden van robuuste data pipelines en datamodellen binnen een moderne data-architectuur.




Jouw verantwoordelijkheden:

Ontwikkelen en optimaliseren van data pipelines en ETL-processen
Ontwerpen en onderhouden van dimensionele datamodellen
Implementeren van Type 2 Slowly Changing Dimensions
Optimaliseren van queries en data pipelines voor performance en schaalbaarheid
Samenwerken met data-analisten en architecten om datamodellen aan te scherpen
Doorvoeren van wijzigingen in bestaande modellen en datasets
Borgen van datakwaliteit, betrouwbaarheid en herleidbaarheid
Werken volgens Agile/Scrum principes en CI/CD-processen
Actieve bijdrage leveren binnen een multidisciplinair data team




Profiel:

HBO werk- en denkniveau (IT / data-gericht)
Aantoonbare ervaring als Data Engineer
Sterke kennis van SQL en ervaring met DBT
Ervaring met cloud data platforms (bij voorkeur Snowflake)
Ervaring met dimensionele datamodellen en incrementeel laden
Ervaring met performance-optimalisatie van data pipelines
Ervaring met Agile/Scrum en CI/CD
Professionele beheersing van de Nederlandse taal




Extra informatie:

Inzet: 40 uur per week
Locatie: Amersfoort / Hybride (2 dagen per week op kantoor)
Tarief: Marktconform
Duur: tot en met 31 december 2026 (met optie tot verlenging)
Contractvorm: Detachering (geen zzp, geen doorleenconstructies)
Screening: VOG verplicht
Show more
